about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes

  • Improved version of the rank 13 long-range frigate “Mauler”
  • Unique portrait “Polemarch”
  • Unique decor “Connector of destiny”

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 30 days!

“Mauler” is perhaps the most unconventional of Jericho’s projects. Its energy core is so massive that connections and heat sinks run through the entire ship, making it glow with an inner light. This put limitations on the ship’s armour, but scientists were able to install composite materials on “Mauler”, thus reinforcing its hull. It was designed as a flagship for an experienced Jericho officer, but as a result of a skirmish with the Cybers, the officer was killed. The original construction plans were changed, the design and internal structure were completely reworked. “Mauler” simply turned the battleship market upside down, forcing mercenaries and pilots from different sides to buy this ship. It is said that the man responsible for building this ship suffered from a personality disorder and committed suicide after a record sales spike.

Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes

  • Unique portrait “Polemarch”

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 30 days!

“Mauler” is perhaps the most unconventional of Jericho’s projects. Its energy core is so massive that connections and heat sinks run through the entire ship, making it glow with an inner light. This put limitations on the ship’s armour, but scientists were able to install composite materials on “Mauler”, thus reinforcing its hull. It was designed as a flagship for an experienced Jericho officer, but as a result of a skirmish with the Cybers, the officer was killed. The original construction plans were changed, the design and internal structure were completely reworked. “Mauler” simply turned the battleship market upside down, forcing mercenaries and pilots from different sides to buy this ship. It is said that the man responsible for building this ship suffered from a personality disorder and committed suicide after a record sales spike.

name: Star Conflict - Mauler

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: This pack includesImproved version of the rank 13 long-range frigate “Mauler”Unique portrait “Polemarch”Unique decor “Connector of destiny”Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 30 days!
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
